AndroidHomeModal.title: ANDROID_HOME is missing
AndroidHomeModal.text:
At this stage, we are unable to automatically locate the necessary libraries. We would like to use your Android Studio installation, but we are unable to find the specified environment variable.

You can find a brief description of the variable on the<1>Android Developer Platform</1>. Or you can try searching for help on <2>Stack Overflow</2>.

List.createTitle: Will be available in future versions
